description:
Doulou titled.
Has a history with Tang Hao.
He alone, or part of team, hunted down Tang Hao and wife/lover, Ah Yin, along with baby Tang San. Apparently in order to obtain a rare treasure, which is hinted to be Ah Yin, or a spirit ability of hers in regards to a ritual - maybe the one where she sacrificed her life to give a red/100`000 year spirit ring to Tang Hao.
name: Ju Hua Guan
